response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a special price of $750,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its true worth, making it an attractive proposition for someone who appreciates its quality and significance. I believe that you would cherish and utilize this product to its fullest potential, just as I have. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
